levels.level: A fantastic start at the basics of publishing open data. It takes a lot to even get here.
Extra effort went in to support and encourage feedback from people who use this open data.
Regularly published open data with robust support that people can rely on to build ever more ambitious projects and ventures on top of.
This is above and beyond what’s expected - a fine example of information infrastructure for everyone else to aspire to.

question.label: What's this data called?
question.help: People see the name of your open data in a list of similar ones so make this as unambiguous and descriptive as you can in this tiny box so they quickly identify what's unique about it.
